name: Courtyard by Marriott Memphis Airport

reviews.text: Everything everyone else states here effectively describes this hotel...however the following really were disappointing about this property.
reviews.title: A Few Problems......

reviews.text: First off arrived at 1345 hrs on a Thurs aft after flying all night , and was told to come back later as housekeeping was in a conference. For an airport hotel, inexcuseable, I suspect there had to be at least one room made up and ready in the place given housekeeping had to have been at work since early morning. If they are not cleaning the vacated rooms first they need to start doing so.
reviews.title: A high quality Courtyard

reviews.text: Second, I had arranged to have two deliveries made just prior to my arrival, and alerted the hotel to this fact. They found one box right away, but could not find the the other, which FED EX had delivered the day before. This went on for two days until someone finally looked in another spot and found it.
reviews.title: Great Choice

likes.disliked: — Would not turn on lights to swim in pool at nighty

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Third, my room was on the back of the building and the interstate
reviews.title: Friendly staff

reviews.text: one parking lot away was a little noisy, though it did quiet down somewhat at night. Get a room facing the interior court if possible.
reviews.title: Fabulous Breakfast
Winner by default
reviews.text: Anyone who has stayed near the Memphis airport knows its pretty much hit or miss on a good hotel. This is not the family friendly walk you toddler along the street type of area. That being said the Airport Courtyard offers the most in the safe category with a gated entrance to the parking lot and a location among office buildings. The hotel itself is also not too bad, but the location is everything in this case and the courtyard has it hands down.

YUCK! We flew in to Memphis got to the hotel at midnight. There were wet paint signs on all the doors and hallwwy areas. The outside door to the parking lot was propped open. We were on the first floor in a 1 bdrm suite. I think the word to descibe this place was DANK!
reviews.title: YUCK!!!!

reviews.text: We were wiped out so my 15yr old opened the sofa sleeper and lo and behold old bed linens and towels....ok at this point we are gorssed out. We did call the fron desk and about 15 mins later we had bedding. There were no remotes in the room so the simple act of the tv turning on and off was even tought.
reviews.title: Consistently good hotel

likes.liked: — comfortable room - the bed and pillows were in great condition and the bedding was changed daily if requested
likes.disliked: — the position of the tv in relation to watching it from the bed

reviews.text: The furnishings looked circa 1980. We are BIG Marriott people just look at all of our reviews but for the cost of the room which was like 189 a night we would have done better elsewhere. so my advice STAY AWAY!
reviews.title: Best part of the trip next to Graceland!

likes.liked: — Cleanliness of rooms and comfort of beds

reviews.text: Our experience at this hotel began with a smile on the face of our shuttle driver and a friendly greeting -- that set the theme for our stay -- good service, good food and good time! The front desk staff are always courteous and accommodating but willing to chat if time permits; the housekeeping staff are efficient and friendly; the restaurant staff react to allergy needs with kindness and the food is always fresh and well prepared.
reviews.title: Great Service!

reviews.text: I spent a night at the Memphis Courtyard due to an early morning flight. The front desk personal was friendly and explained the use of the gate that allows you into the secure parking lot. Check in was a breeze. The room had the typical layout that I am use to, nice comfortable bed, a couch, refrigerator and a workstation with free Internet. The bathroom and rest of the room were very clean. There is no restaurant nearby, however the front desk has info for restaurants that deliver and instructions on how to get to nearby eateries. They do have a breakfast buffet in the mornings. It should be noted that since it is near the airport, noise could be a problem if you are a light sleeper. FedEx has planes landing at all hours of the night so there is the sound of jets flying overhead. Overall, a good place to stay.
reviews.title: A comfortable place to stay.

likes.liked: — Free Internet and location by the airport

reviews.title: Great hotel, but beware of venturing out after dark
reviews.text: The hotel was great. Comfortable beds, friendly staff, descent delivery from local restaurants.
No room service. Nice seafood restaurant just a few minutes away. Bad location, but it does have gates around for security.
reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised

likes.disliked: — had a little trouble opening the gate

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great for a hotel close to MEM, but it is too far for a night on Beale.
reviews.title: Clean Clean Clean

reviews.text: By the way Marriott Rewards members, they don't seem to look at your preferences when they give you your room. You might want to make sure of your room before you get there with all of your luggage.
reviews.title: OK airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Starting from when my wife and I were picked up at the Memphis Airport, (after a huge screw up and subsequent airline delay) by the shuttle bus driver from the Courtyard Airport Hotel in Memphis our stress and anger with the airline were forgotten when the driver of the hotel shuttle had some jazz playing on the radio and told us about some of the sights and places to eat near the hotel. He was genuine and the great service did not stop when we got to the hotel. The front desk staff was just as gracious and made our unexpected stay a great one! Just wanted to let some one out there know that it is a hotel you can feel good about staying at. Thanks Courtyard by Marriot!
reviews.title: Great Stay at the Courtyard Hotel

likes.liked: — excellent airport hotel for a stopover in Memphis

aka: Courtyard By Marriott Memphis Airport Hotel Memphis
description: Contemporary Residential-style Hotel located 2 miles from Memphis Int'l Airport & 3 miles south of Graceland.
